pages.text: The Cold Snap Zapper was built to watch over a charged creeper farm. After studying the lightning and lightning rods, the Zapper was able to find a quick, cheap, and effective way to summon lightning on command. Their first test was on the player who created them, sticking a small device on their back and running away. The result was electrifying.

pages.title: Nether Zapper
pages.text: A Zapper, melted from the heat of the Nether. No one knows how or why a horde of snowmen decided going to the Nether would be a good idea, but those that have leave behind a trail of slush when they move.

pages.title: End Zapper
pages.text: A Zapper, mutated by the desolate environments of the end. Has a chance to teleport you or itself when attacking or attacked

pages.title: Plague Zapper
pages.text: A Zapper filled with the murky waters of the swamp. May transmit parasites and diseases, or generally make you feel unwell
